recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish featuring a creamy sauce made with eggs, Parmesan cheese, and bacon or pancetta.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Rich and creamy pasta dish with tender chicken breast and a decadent Alfredo sauce.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Simple yet elegant salad showcasing fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil, drizzled with balsamic glaze.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic homemade cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect for satisfying your sweet tooth.

recipes.name: Margarita Pizza
recipes.description: Traditional Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves, baked to perfection.
ingredients: 250 g of pizza dough or pizza dough mix

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Healthy and flavorful stir-fried mixed vegetables served with tofu or chicken over a bed of rice or noodles.
